title: Wout van Aert: ‘I’m In The Worst Shape of Any Tour de France I’ve Been At’
content:
It's a case of wait and see for Visma-Lease a Bike's Belgian all-rounder, hoping to be competitive in Tour sprints after damaging spring crash.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert: ‘I’m In The Worst Shape of Any Tour de France I’ve Been At’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
